Constant connection issues. Can play other games with no issue but this one loves to have lag that makes the matches unplayable.

Problems with the game are not fixed in a timely manor.

BHVR doesn't care about us. The player base is pretty toxic. Getting a match as a survivor takes a long time. 
I am addicted. I would give genuine feedback if I thought that BHVR looked, because the game is actually great. It can be so much fun when you get a good match, and Ghostface mains are the best! I love those guys. The bugs are actually fixed relatively fast and when there is a bug its usually funny as hell. I simultaneously want to recommend this game and say damn you BHVR, listen to us for once!

Unless you are playing as survivor with friends, this game is no longer fun. Killers don't stand a chance in hell unless they are extremely good and have unlocked all the meta perks. Don't waste your time, play another game.

When you quit the game, none of it's programs exit on top of not being able to force terminate Steam either. So the game is not running but running. 
I can't access the external drive which the game is on because apparently the game or it's resources is blocking that too. It will even crash the whole File Explorer system if I wait to access the drive for too long.
Restarting takes forever I have to force shutdown.

Oh and let's not forget the terrible matchmaking because nobody is playing it much, 2.4 hours in the last 2 weeks when I just reinstalled the game today, 20mins setup/reconfigure, 1.5 hours waiting combined and the rest is gameplay. Give me a break.
This makes me want to cry

A game with ok mechanics at best.  Easily the most toxic community of players of any game I have ever played.  Extraordinarily non-receptive development team to player feedback.  BHVR is petty towards any negative feedback by streamers. Knowing what I do now I would have never bought this game, or spent the time I did playing.  Save your money and buy literally anything else.  The novelty will wear off.  Avoid in favor of a game you will actually like down the road.
It's not as good as it used to be. The matchmaking is getting worse with every update, and the devs are not putting any effort in the game anymore

I paid so much for this shit and got banned. 
They didn't even bother tell me the reason except being banned because I broke one of the EULA terms.
At least tell me which cuz i didn't do shit.

I've only played this game for 3 hours and I love it. You may think that it's scary, but it really isn't. The only time it's kind of scary is when the killer is chasing you when you're trying to get to the exit, or when they pop out of no where and attack you. When you first play the game and have no one to play with, it's kind of eerie and scary but you'll get used to it. If you have a friend that already plays or wants to play, then 100% get this game, you guys will have the time of your life.
Carried by game concept alone, execution is trash. Littered with toxic players and cheaters (game rewards playing toxic). Play a 1 minute game then wait 10 minutes to find another
Fun game but the devs need to focus on fixing the game before adding to it!

this game is super fun. I started playing only recently and right from the start, I got attached to it. the game is really well made and pretty competitive after 27 hours of playtime I feel like I will never get bored of this game
I love the constant updates the only thing i would change about this game is the skill-based match making can be a bit questionable sometimes but other then that best game i ever played

This game used to be one of my favorites. I loved it, and wish I could still play it.
For whatever reason, after the last few expansions, my frame rate is so unbelievably bad that I can't even see what I'm doing.
It will go from saying 70+ one second, to the whole screen being frozen for 3-5 seconds immediately after.
I tried switching to low settings (which I never had to in the past - I always played on the highest settings before) but even that hasn't helped. It's even freezing up on loading screens and when opening different menus for changing characters, etc.
When this first happened, I decided to give this game a couple of months as a break - to see if it would improve, but I am sad to say that it hasn't improved one bit.
I don't know what they did to break their optimization so badly, but I can no longer play this game.
A real shame.
Ive been playing and I had so much fun, and I'm saying that as a killer main

Extremely survivor sided game, has a ''skill'' based matchmaking that traps you to a level no player can compete, has tons of cheaters, devs are too lazy to balance anything in the game, fix bugs or ban cheaters, they are so good at releasing Feng cosmetics tho, tons of time required to grind perks, has the most toxic community I have ever seen. You will need to be so ignorant to have fun playing this game (just like its popular streamers). I don't know how many racist hate comments i had to delete from my profile.
it's just hella fun. it does need getting used to but i really enjoy playing it :)

This game was pretty good but now its just shit. playing killer seems quit impossible becuase your only get genruhsed unless you a pro-gamer. And playing surviver is not fun since everybody is tunneling and camping becuase there is no other way to win.
Great Game. The grind the beginning to get the main perks is long but the pay off is 100% worth it, the game will become soo fun. I highly recommend this game.

Devs have made it very clear that they will not accept any criticism from their fanbase. They haven't listened to what people need or want for a long time, with the game being unbalanced, constantly broken and buggy, to a point where I'm deinstalling for good, and will look elsewhere.
